Address.label: Address
Address.value: 5430 LBJ FREEWAY,SUITE 1800, THREE LINCOLN CENTRE, DALLAS, Texas, 75240, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Atmos Energy is the largest publicly traded, fully regulated, pure-play natural gas utility in the United States, serving more than 3 million customers in Texas, Colorado, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Mississippi, Tennessee, and Virginia. About 70% of its earnings come from Texas, where it distributes natural gas in northern Texas and owns an intrastate gas pipeline spanning several key shale gas formations and interconnected with five storage facilities.
